#summary Steps to create a release.

= Introduction =

So that we do this consistently, this page captures the process whereby we do a release.

= Details =

 * Verify copyright licenses on all files in release
 * If this is the first release of a new year, verify that all files changed since the first of the year have an updated copyright date on them.
 * Confirm that all bugs marked [http://code.google.com/p/genxdm/issues/list?can=2&q=status%3AFixed+&colspec=ID+Type+Status+Priority+Milestone+Owner+Summary&cells=tiles fixed] for the release have been verified.
 * Request a vote on the particular revision # planned for release
 * Build the release
 * Create a ZIP and .tar.gz of the source, as well as the built binary files
 * Build the site, and then update [http://genxdm.org]
 * Send out an email announcing the release
 * Post an announcement to the [http://genxdm.wordpress.com/ wiki]
